name: Self-Myofascial Release
description: Techniques for releasing muscle tightness and improving circulation.

cards.title: Foam Rolling for Quadriceps
cards.description: Using a foam roller to release tension in the quadriceps muscles.
bulletpoints: Place a foam roller under the front of your thighs
Roll slowly from the hips to just above the knees
Pause on tight areas and apply gentle pressure
cards.summaryText: Glide a foam roller along the quads, pausing on hot spots to ease tightness and boost circulation.

cards.title: Lacrosse Ball Massage for Glutes
cards.description: Targeting deep tissue in the glutes using a small massage ball.
bulletpoints: Sit on a lacrosse ball and apply gentle pressure
Slowly move in small circles to release tension
Perform on both sides to improve symmetry
cards.summaryText: Sit into a lacrosse ball and make slow circles to unlock glute trigger points on each side.
